errors.error_description: Incorrect Python version requirement - specifying Python 2.7 instead of Python 3
correction_candidates: Bitcart requires Python 3.7 or higher and Node.js for optimal performance.
Bitcart requires Python 3.6+ for core functionality.
Bitcart requires Python 3.8 or later versions.
Bitcart is compatible with Python 3.9 and above.
errors.golden_answer: Bitcart requires Python 3.7 or higher and Node.js for optimal performance.

errors.error_description: Invalid npm command that doesn't exist for this Python project
correction_candidates: git clone https://github.com/bitcart/bitcart && cd bitcart && pip install -e .
